about_the_game:
Mall Simulator is a chill first-person simulation where you will experience a giant mall tycoon with various stores that you run yourself.

Design matters! Create the best design for your mall and manage your stores. Showcase your best-seller stores and create the perfect mall for your customers.

Zero to hero! Open new stores of the most famous brands and sell their products in your mall. Expand your stores in the mall from a grocery to a jewellery.

Out of stock? Always supply new products and follow new trends to keep your customers in your mall.

Time is money! Your mall may be busy, take payments and hire new workers so you don't keep your customers waiting.

Smash the walls! Open up new spaces and make room for more stores and brands in your mall.

In Mall Simulator, customer satisfaction is neccesary. You have to keep up with trends, make new store openings, set good prices and grow your mall to avoid going bankrupt.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700K or AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660S, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Turn your shop from a small shopping center into a huge city mall! To avoid going bankrupt, you'll need to negotiate new store deals, set good prices and keep up with trends. Upper floors, cleaning, shoplifters and security are upcoming.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Greek, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch
